coffees.name: Coffee
coffees.description: Our black coffee is an enjoyable balance of sweet, bitter, and acidic notes with no cream, milk, or sweetener added. Enjoy it warm on a cold day!

coffees.name: Latte
coffees.description: Our latte is great for coffee lovers who enjoy the delight of a sweet milk mask. Perfect for a chilly day!

coffees.name: Espresso
coffees.description: Our espresso is strong shot of caffeine with a chocalatey and nutty base and a smooth finish. Great for those who need a warm shot of energy!

coffees.name: Mocha
coffees.description: Our Mocha is for chocolate-lovers who enjoy a kick of espresso with a milk base. Perfect for a cozy cold day!

coffees.name: Americano
coffees.description: Our americano adopts the chocalatey and nutty flavors and aromas of our espresso, but with a less powerful taste. A great way to enjoy a warm boost of caffeine!

coffees.name: Iced Coffee
coffees.description: Our iced black coffee is an enjoyable balance of sweet, bitter, and acidic notes with no cream, milk, or sweetener added. Enjoy this on a hot day!

coffees.name: Iced Latte
coffees.description: Our latte is great for coffee lovers who enjoy the delight of a sweet milk mask. Great for cooling off!

coffees.name: Iced Espresso
coffees.description: Our espresso is strong shot of caffeine with a chocalatey and nutty base and a smooth finish. Enjoy it iced for a quick cool boost of caffeine!

coffees.name: Iced Mocha
coffees.description: Our Mocha is for chocolate-lovers who enjoy a kick of espresso with a milk base. Great cool drink for chocolate lovers!

coffees.name: Frappe
coffees.description: Our frappe is a fun and refreshing milk and espresso-based blended drink. Enjoy it on a hot day out!
